hotels.title: Tranquil Hunter Valley Studio Retreat with Breakfast Hamper & Two Cellar Door Tastings
hotels.description: Embrace the serenity of the Hunter Valley’s renowned wine region with a stay at this cosy retreat. Be enveloped by a world of countryside charm at this unique escape, home to 60 beautifully appointed studios, each with breathtaking views of the vine-laced landscape and towering Broken Back Range. Wandering kangaroos, singing kookaburras and mountains as far as the eye can see are some of the attractions that make this sanctuary, just two hours from Sydney, such a special escape to reconnect, recharge and relax. Fine wine and relaxation devotees will fall head over heels for this gorgeous rural sojourn amid the world-famous Hunter Valley wine country. Less than five minutes down the road, guests can find Bimbagden Winery, home to award-winning dining at Esca restaurant and Bimbadgen Pizzeria. Sitting on 37 acres of vineyard and native bushland, with an outdoor pool and The Lane Pantry offering a selection of gourmet provisions, The Lane Retreat is your gateway to the quintessential Hunter Valley experience.

hotels.title: Sophisticated Stay in the Hunter Valley Gardens near Award-Winning Wineries
hotels.description: Escape to this Hunter Valley retreat, where endless clear skies meet rolling vineyards, stretching like a patchwork quilt over the land. Here, you’ll be just steps away from the region’s picturesque gardens, world-class cellar doors and fine-dining restaurants. While the location draws visitors in, this hotel’s sporty-chic pool, sauna, spa and tennis courts ensure that they’ll want to linger. The onsite European-inspired eatery éléments Bar & Dining offers refined yet casual experience set against a backdrop of lush greenery.

hotels.title: Romantic Five-Star Oasis in the Heart of The Hunter Valley
hotels.description: Discover the true meaning of serenity at the breathtaking modern farmhouse estate of Spicers Guesthouse, in the Hunter Valley. The property is perfectly located in the heart of this exceptional wine region, bringing together the joys of wine tasting and total relaxation. Luxuriate in the gorgeous guesthouse, designed with rustic country charm, take a dip in the stunning pool and dine at éRemo Restaurant, passionately serving authentic Italian cuisine.
